name: Home Sweet Home : Survive
summary: Home Sweet Home is back with its soul-stirring sequel that will haunt you to the ground ! Immerse yourself in a world of Thai myths, let's fight together to get out of this horrifying world. The 4vs1 game from a Thai studio that will give you the experience of hunting and being hunted in one game.
info:
• 别名: HSH SURVIVE
  • 别名: 甜蜜之家：绝境求生
  • 别名: 甜蜜之家：絕境求生
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Horror-Survival
  • 游玩人数: 1-5
  • 发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 4 日
  • 官方网站: https://www.homesweethomegame.com/survive-home
  • 官方网站: https://www.homesweethomegame.com/
  • Press Kit: https://www.homesweethomegame.com/survive-preskit-eng

  • 发行: Shift Now
